skills.name: Install Elysia
skills.pattern: bun add elysia

skills.name: Basic Server
skills.pattern:
import { Elysia } from 'elysia';
new Elysia().get('/', () => 'Hello Elysia').listen(3000);

skills.name: GET Route
skills.pattern: app.get('/users', () => ({ users: [] }));

skills.name: POST Route
skills.pattern: app.post('/users', ({ body }) => ({ created: body }));

skills.name: Route Parameters
skills.pattern: app.get('/users/:id', ({ params: { id } }) => ({ id }));

skills.name: Query Strings
skills.pattern: app.get('/search', ({ query: { q, page } }) => ({ q, page }));

skills.name: All Methods
skills.pattern: app.get(), app.post(), app.put(), app.patch(), app.delete(), app.options(), app.head(), app.all()

skills.name: Context
skills.pattern: app.get('/example', ({ body, query, params, headers, cookie, set, store }) => { ... });

skills.name: Set Response
Type Safety
Response Schema
Query Schema
Use Plugin
skills.pattern: app.use(myPlugin);

skills.name: Create Plugin
skills.pattern:
const plugin = new Elysia().get('/plugin', () => 'From plugin');
app.use(plugin);

skills.name: @elysiajs/cors
skills.pattern:
import { cors } from '@elysiajs/cors';
app.use(cors());

skills.name: @elysiajs/swagger
skills.pattern:
import { swagger } from '@elysiajs/swagger';
app.use(swagger());

skills.name: @elysiajs/jwt
@elysiajs/bearer
skills.pattern:
import { bearer } from '@elysiajs/bearer';
app.use(bearer()).get('/auth', ({ bearer }) => bearer);

skills.name: Lifecycle Hooks
skills.pattern:
app.onRequest(() => console.log('Request'))
   .onBeforeHandle(() => { /* validate */ })
   .onAfterHandle(({ response }) => response)
   .onError(({ error }) => error.message);

skills.name: Derive
State
skills.pattern:
app.state('version', '1.0.0')
   .get('/version', ({ store }) => store.version);

skills.name: Decorate
skills.pattern:
app.decorate('db', database)
   .get('/users', ({ db }) => db.query('SELECT * FROM users'));

skills.name: Error Handling
Cookie
Route Groups
Guard
WebSocket
Static Files
skills.pattern:
import { staticPlugin } from '@elysiajs/static';
app.use(staticPlugin());

skills.name: Eden Client
Performance
skills.pattern: Elysia is one of the fastest Bun frameworks with end-to-end type safety
